nodes.text: The Mos Entha hotel was located in the settlement of Mos Entha, on the desert planet Tatooine.

The hotel has a rectangular multi-storied central section, topped with a round dome. Behind this, was a circular tower with an antenna rising from the top. At the front of the hotel was circular reception building which was reached by a number of stairs. This was surrounded by a courtyard area with a few gardens and awnings for shade. The whole hotel comples was built out of sandstone.

In 0 ABY, Rebel Alliance operative Captain Hantor Loftus operated out of this hotel, dispatching spacers on a number of missions to undermine the Galactic Empire. On one occasion, Loftus had a spacer escort smuggler Jaxa Lian back to the hotel, in order to protect her from being captured the Imperials as part of their Project Lasercutter.
